basic.production: Northwestern Sichuan, Southern Gansu, Southern Shaanxi, Northwestern Hubei
basic.blooming: Flowering period April, fruiting period May
basic.color: Flower color light pink, white, green

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist during the growing season
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
